thread.section_title: Paramount Hotel Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: I stay here every year
thread.title_full: I stay here every year - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah W
title: I stay here every year
text:
This is a great hotel and very central. The room I stayed in this year was very reasonably sized. The beds are very big and comfortable, I slept very well in this hotel.
The staff are very friendly and helpful particularly the staff in the bar.
Be aware, it is in central Times Square so both the food and drink are very expensive. I wold suggest going elsewhere to eat or drink.
I will continue to stay in this hotel each year.
